com.magnet.controller.spi

Interface Controller

  • All Superinterfaces:
    PlatformProvider, RequiredService
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    LoggedInUserController, LoginController

    @Contract
public interface Controller
extends PlatformProvider, RequiredService
    Marker interface used to signify an application's controller logic.

    An Controller is comprised of the set of public methods that are available to client callers (e.g., through REST). 

     public class MyController implements Controller {
   @Named("my-name")
   public String getName() {...}
   
   public String isName(@javax.inject.Named("name") String name) {...}

   private String isName2(String name) {...}
   
 }
    Important Note: Only interfaces directly inheriting from Controller will have their interfaces exposed if declared as RemoteAccessible.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String TARGET
      This is used when defining controller methods that are the target of a controller for which @SupportedTargets is defined.

      • Fields inherited from interface com.magnet.spi.PlatformProvider

        MAGNET_VERSION_1_0_0, MAGNET_VERSION_2_0_0

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface com.magnet.spi.PlatformProvider

        getVersion

    • Field Detail

      • TARGET

        static final String TARGET
        This is used when defining controller methods that are the target of a controller for which @SupportedTargets is defined. It should mark an MagnetUri or an instance of class that extends the supported target class.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
